effect_entries.effect: This Pokémon does not take damage from friendly Pokémon's moves, including single-target moves aimed at it.
effect_entries.short_effect: Protects against friendly Pokémon's damaging moves.

effect_entries.effect: This Pokémon's moves ignore light screen, reflect, and safeguard.
effect_entries.short_effect: Bypasses light screen, reflect, and safeguard.

effect_entries.effect:
When this Pokémon enters battle, it reveals an opposing Pokémon's held item to all participating trainers.

In a double battle, if one opponent has an item, this Pokémon will Frisk that Pokémon; if both have an item, it will Frisk one at random.
effect_entries.short_effect: Reveals an opponent's held item upon entering battle.
